data.title: Ariel Sharon, Former Israeli Prime Minister, Dies at 85
data.meta_description: Sharon, a Controversial Military Leader, Launched a Long and Tumultuous Political Career That Culminated in the Disengagement From Gaza. He Died After Eight Years in a Coma at Tel Hashomer Hospital in Tel Aviv.
